Class GameClient

java.lang.Object
system.GameClient
public class GameClient extends Object
Client class that contains the socket to used for communication to the server, as well as protocols for network messages. Maps to a Player contained in the server's model.
Since:
23

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int

    The unique ID of the client, initialized to -1.

    The name of the client player.

    Listener for handling game-related events.
    private PrintWriter
    out
    Writer for sending messages to the server.
    private Thread
    receiveThread
    Thread for receiving messages from the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameClient

      public GameClient(int port, String ip, GameControllerListener listener, String playerName) throws IOException
      Constructor that creates a new GameClient object with a specified name. Once the object is created, the client starts receiving commands from the host.
      Parameters:
      port - the port to listen on
      ip - the ip to connect to
      listener - listener
      playerName - the player's name
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong
      Since:
      23

  • Method Details

    • startReceiving

      private void startReceiving()
      Start the thread that is responsible for receiving network packets from the host. Packet protocol is MSGTYPE|OPTIONALINFO|OPTIONALINFO... etc. The method switches on the packet "type", which is the 0th index of the packet. What happens next depends on the packet type, but mostly involves calling some method from the listener.
      Since:
      23

    • sendChat

      public void sendChat(String msg)
      Sends a chat message to the server.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to send.
      Since:
      23

    • sendName

      public void sendName()
      Sends the client's name to the server. Used for identification after connection.
      Since:
      23

    • sendDraw

      public void sendDraw()
      Sends a draw request to the server to draw a card.
      Since:
      23

    • sendPlay

      public void sendPlay(String card)
      Sends a play request to the server with the specified card.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to play.
      Since:
      23

    • sendSuit

      public void sendSuit(String suit, String cardToPlay)
      Sends the chosen suit and card to the server, typically after playing an eight.
      Parameters:
      suit - The chosen suit.
      cardToPlay - The card being played.
      Since:
      23

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Sends a disconnect request to the server.
      Since:
      23

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Facilitates shutdown of the GameClient. Closes the PrintWriter, the socket, and interrupts the thread.
      Since:
      23
